trans-unit.source: The set model represents a DJ set which will most likely consist of multiple audio tracks mixed together by a DJ. Depending on the length of a DJ set it will be represented through one or more recordings.
The catalogue number that was used for the release of the DJ set by the music label.
If the label also uses catalogue numbers to index DJ sets you can specify it here.
Highlight a DJ set as FEATURED

You can highlight a DJ set with a FEATURED marker by enabling this option. This will also show this DJ set in a list of DJ sets having the FEATURED option enabled when using a plugin which is configured to show only FEATURED DJ sets.
Highlight a DJ set as NEW
You can highlight a DJ set with a NEW marker by enabling this option.
The name of the music label which released the DJ set.
If the DJ set has been released by a music label you can specify its name here.
Add recordings to the DJ set
A DJ set consists of one or more recordings. These can be added here.
Additional name for the release, if desired
If you want to, you can specify an additional release name. For example, this can be used for the name of a music series.
The date when the DJ set has been released
Although the release date-field contains date and time the time is not taken into account when being displayed in the frontend.
